metadata.title: CVE-2020-16845 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Go before 1.13.15 and 14.x before 1.14.7 can have an infinite read loop inReadUvarint and ReadVarint in encoding/binary via invalid inputs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-16845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1.1
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1.1
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.8-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.13.8-1ubuntu1.1').
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
